name: Hot On The Trail (Zweeps, Zarbix, Malef)
name_original: Hot On The Trail (Zweeps, Zarbix, Malef)
description:
Hot On The Trail (Zweeps, Zarbix, Malef) is an action, adventure and platformer game developed by Malef, Zweeps and Zarbix. It came out on 18-03-2023.
You can play Hot On The Trail (Zweeps, Zarbix, Malef) on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
